function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mass video surveillance for social distancing monitoring","Impact":"Violation of privacy, potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, anonymize data, and obtain consent from individuals","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, consent management systems","People":"Residents, individuals in public areas","Owner":"City government, data protection authorities"},{"Description":"Detection of individuals with disease symptoms through video surveillance","Impact":"Potential violation of medical privacy, stigma for individuals with symptoms","Mitigation":"Anonymize data, restrict access to health-related information, and provide education on stigma reduction","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, access controls, education platforms","People":"Individuals with disease symptoms, residents in public areas","Owner":"Health authorities, city government"},{"Description":"Real-time monitoring of physical contacts between individuals","Impact":"Risk of false positives, potential invasion of personal space","Mitigation":"Implement context-aware analysis, provide clear guidelines on acceptable contact, and review and improve algorithms for accuracy","Technologies":"Context-aware analysis tools, guidelines on physical contact, algorithm improvement systems","People":"Residents in public areas","Owner":"City government, technology developers"}]}
